help.commandNotFound: No command with the name {name} was found.

embed.title: Help Menu
embed.description: This is a very useful help menu.

commandErrors.botAdminsOnly: This command can only be used by bot administrators.
commandErrors.dmOnly: This command can only be used in DMs.
commandErrors.guildOnly: This command can only be used in servers.
commandErrors.supportServerOnly: This command can only be used in [our support server]({support}).
commandErrors.userMissingPermissions: You are missing the following permissions to run this command: {permissions}
commandErrors.botMissingPermissions: The bot is missing the following permissions to run this command: {permissions}
commandErrors.unexpectedErrorOccurred: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
